Plot: An unflattering look inside America's corporate controlled food industry.
Title: Food, Inc.
Writer: Robert Kenner, Elise Pearlstein, Kim Roberts
Actors: Eric Schlosser, Richard Lobb, Vince Edwards, Carole Morison
tomatoConsensus: An eye-opening expose of the modern food industry, Food, Inc. is both fascinating and terrifying, and essential viewing for any health-conscious citizen.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 18 nominations.
